headline: From Ford to Suntory to Salesforce: Big hitters on Opening Bid
summary: From Investing 101 to the future of AI and even the billionaire mindset, Opening Bid has brought you key coverage from all angles of the investing world. In this episode, you’ll hear from several top names, including Howard Buffett, CEO and Chairman of the Howard G. Buffett Foundation; Ford (F) CEO Jim Farley; Salesforce (CRM) Co-Founder, Chairman, and CEO Marc Benioff; Economist Judy Shelton; and Suntory (STBFY) CEO Tak Niinami. For full episodes of Opening Bid, listen on your favorite podcast platform or watch on our website. This post was written by Rachael Lewis-Krisky, producer for Opening Bid.
